SEARCH
Package io.github.coho04.dcbcore.interfaces

Interface CommandInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BotOwner, BotStats, Donate, Help, Invite, Join, Ping, Restart, Shutdown
public interface CommandInterface
The CommandInterface defines the structure for handling slash commands and auto-complete interactions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Returns the command data for the slash command.

  • Method Details

    • commandData

      net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.commands.build.CommandData commandData()
      Returns the command data for the slash command.
      Returns:
      CommandData object containing the command information.

    • runSlashCommand

      void runSlashCommand(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.command.SlashCommandInteractionEvent e, DCBot dcBot)
      Handles the execution of the slash command.
      Parameters:
      e - The SlashCommandInteractionEvent triggered by the command.
      dcBot - The DCBot instance.

    • runCommandAutoComplete

      default void runCommandAutoComplete(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.command.CommandAutoCompleteInteractionEvent e, DCBot dcBot)
      Handles the auto-complete interaction for the command. This method is optional and can be overridden by implementing classes.
      Parameters:
      e - The CommandAutoCompleteInteractionEvent triggered by the interaction.
      dcBot - The DCBot instance.

    • hasRole

      default boolean hasRole(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Role role, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Member member)
      Checks if a member has a specific role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to check.
      member - The member whose roles are being checked.
      Returns:
      true if the member has the specified role, false otherwise.
